trans-unit.source: This exception is intended for use by classes that inherit from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider"></xref> when the operation cannot be performed because of the state of the instance lock.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceLockException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceLockException"></xref> class.
The unique identifier of the exception instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceLockException"></xref> class.
The message that describes the current exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceLockException"></xref> class.
The unique identifier of the exception instance.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> instance that caused the current exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceLockException"></xref> class.
The unique identifier of the exception instance.
The message that describes the current exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceLockException"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceLockException"></xref> class.
The message that describes the current exception.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> instance that caused the current exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceLockException"></xref> class.
The unique identifier of the exception instance.
The message that describes the current exception.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> instance that caused the current exception.
Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the exception.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
The unique identifier of the exception instance.
A <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that contains the unique identifier of the exception instance.
